price: Gaskiya daga Ubangijinka* take sabõda haka, lalle kada ka kasance daga mãsu shakka.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ
footnotes: * Jũyãwar alƙibla abu ne na gaskiya daga Allah dõmin rarrashin wanda Allah bai yi nufi da tsĩrarsa ba ya ƙãre. Bãyan rarrashi sai yankewa wannan shi ne matakin farko da Musulmi suka fara tsiraita da shi daga maƙiyansu bayyane. Yanzu kuma Musulmi sun zama dabam.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
